listing_company_name: LJ Hooker Point Cook - POINT COOK
description:
LJ Hooker Point Cook presents 476 Bluff Road, Hampton. Here is the opportunity you have been waiting for! Perched upon a generous 611m2 allotment, this well positioned site is simply packed with potential, the perfect candidate for renovation or redevelopment. The existing low set dwelling is completely original and comprises three bedrooms, one bathroom and an eat-in kitchen. The grounds are flat and useable and will accommodate unit or townhome construction, subject to relevant council approvals.

- 611sqm (approx.) potential development site
- Accommodates unit or townhome construction (STCA)
- Excellent exposure on popular Bluff Road
- Existing low set dwelling with three bedrooms and one bathroom
- Minutes from cafes, restaurants, supermarkets and high street shopping
- Moments from Hampton Beach and Sandringham Beach
- Surrounded by parklands and sporting clubs, baseball, tennis, football
- Excellent proximity to public and private schools
- Positioned just 16kms from Melbourne CBD
- Easy access to public transport, including Hampton Station

Surrounded by amenity and offering lifestyle convenience, this property boasts cafes and supermarkets, Hampton Bowls Club and Hampton high street within minutes. The beautiful beaches of Hampton and Sandringham are moments away, while parkland reserves and sporting facilities including Moorabbin Baseball Club and Basterfield Park Tennis Club are also nearby. Families will enjoy proximity to schools including Moorabbin Primary School and Sandringham College, while commuters enjoy easy access to nearby Hampton Station.

Note. All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
